title: Global Brand Marketing Team Lead - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Global Brand Marketing Team Lead Sports Equipment Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: Lead the development of the global brand strategy, working with our agencies of record to develop the seasonal brand campaigns. Lead the cross-business unit sports marketing activation strategy and plans.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
